Title: The Broken Man
Writer: George R.R. Martin (based on "A Song of Ice and Fire" by), David Benioff (created by), D.B. Weiss (created by), Bryan Cogman (written for television by)
Actors: Nikolaj Coster-Waldau, Lena Headey, Kit Harington, Natalie Dormer
Plot: Jon and Sansa gather troops. Jaime arrives at Riverrun. Olenna Tyrell plans to leave King's Landing. Theon and Yara plan a destination. Arya makes plans to leave.
